image_generation_prompt: Generate a vector art style thumbnail image representing the theme 'TOEFL Writing: High-Score Strategy for Both AI and Human Scorers'. The image should be intriguing and make viewers curious. Depict a stylized scene where a Japanese student is thoughtfully writing at a desk. On one side, show a subtle representation of AI technology, like glowing digital lines or a faint circuit pattern, analyzing the writing. On the other side, show a subtle representation of a human evaluator, perhaps a pair of glasses and a thoughtful expression. The overall mood should be focused and optimistic. Avoid prominent text in the image. If any text is absolutely essential, limit it to 'TOEFL Writing' in a very small, discreet font. The image should be clean, modern, and visually appealing.
